mapper.insert: INSERT INTO application ( app_book, app_name, app_pub, app_seq, user_seq ) VALUES( #{app_book}, #{app_name}, #{app_pub}, app_seq.NEXTVAL, 41 )
mapper.update:
UPDATE application SET app_book = #{app_book}, app_name = #{app_name}, app_pub = #{app_pub},
WHERE app_book = #{app_book}, app_name = #{app_name}, app_pub = #{app_pub},
